column4: hey, there is a samba setting up how to on the wiki at ubuntulinux.org/wiki I just found out... http://www.ubuntulinux.org/wiki/SettingUpSamba .
I've already looked at that - doesn't say a lot about how to set up the printer etc...
really? ok, cool, there seem to be links, did you follow those?
looking again now - it may be what i need...not sure...
